artifacts.summary: Implementation summary for phases 6-8: Omega parameterization of SoundnessLemmas, sorry discharge in Soundness and Representation, final verification

completion_data.completion_summary: Discharged 3 sorries (1 in Soundness.lean, 2 in Representation.lean) by Omega-parameterizing the local is_valid definition in SoundnessLemmas.lean over shift-closed Omega sets, then instantiating validity at shiftClosedCanonicalOmega in the completeness proofs. All 8 plan phases completed. Active Metalogic/ sorry count reduced from 10 to 7.
